T08TD4149E:253b-1: ye dharm'asht'i ka / bod skad du /
T08TD4149E:253b-4: da ni ye dharm'a he tu pra b'a wa he tum /
T08TD4149E:253b-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pas rgyud rab tu gnas pa'i don du grub pa'i mtha' gsungs pa yin te /
T08TD4149E:253b-6: 'chad pa po rnams la yang gsungs pa yin no //
T08TD4149E:253b-7: mdo sde dang ni rnal 'byor gyi //
T08TD4149E:253b-8: khang par yang ni 'jug pa nang //
T08TD4149E:253b-9: ye dharm'a sogs tshigs bcad kyis //
T08TD4149E:253b-10: sangs rgyas grub mtha'i phyag rgyas btab //
T08TD4149E:253b-12: de yang ye dharm'a sogs ni bod kyi skad du /
T08TD4149E:253b-13: chos rnams gang dag rgyus 'byung de dag ni //
T08TD4149E:253b-14: rgyu dang de la 'gog pa gang yin pa'ang //
T08TD4149E:253b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis bka' stsal te //
T08TD4149E:253b-16: de skad gsungs pa'i tshul can dge sbyong che //
T08TD4149E:253b-18: chos rnams gang dag rgyus byung zhes pa la gang dag ni rab tu grags pa bdun po rnams te /
T08TD4149E:253b-19: ma rig pa la sogs pa'i lcags sgrog gis kun du bskor ba'i 'khor lo ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bdag nyid can no //
T08TD4149E:253b-20: de dag ni zhes pa nyon mongs pa dang /
T08TD4149E:253b-21: las dang sdug bsngal gyi yan lag gsum dang /
T08TD4149E:253b-22: gnyis dang bdun gyis phye bas gsum du yang gyur pa yin te /
T08TD4149E:253b-23: ma rig pa'i thog ma yin par sangs rgyas nyid kyis gsungs pa yin no //
T08TD4149E:253b-36: rga shi ste bcu gnyis po rnams so //
T08TD4149E:253b-37: ma rig pa ni 'dod chags dang /
T08TD4149E:253b-39: gti mug gi bdag nyid can no //
T08TD4149E:253b-40: 'du byed ni sngon gyi las so //
T08TD4149E:253b-41: rnam par shes pa ni mngal du 'jug pa'o //
T08TD4149E:253b-42: ming dang gzugs ni nur nur po la sogs pa lnga'o //
T08TD4149E:253b-43: skye mched drug ni mig la sogs pa la 'dod do //
T08TD4149E:253b-46: rnam par shes pa rnams phrad pa'o //
T08TD4149E:254a-0: tshor ba ni bde ba la sogs pa'i bdag @254a * //
T08TD4149E:254a-2: sred pa ni 'khrig pa'i 'dod chags so //
T08TD4149E:254a-3: len pa ni 'dod pa'i yul len pa'o //
T08TD4149E:254a-4: srid pa ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i srid pa'i 'bras bu can gyi las so //
T08TD4149E:254a-5: skye ba ni slar yang phung po nyid mtshams sbyor ba'o //
T08TD4149E:254a-9: dgu pa rnams ni nyon mongs pa'o //
T08TD4149E:254a-12: lhag ma bdun ni sdug bsngal lo //
T08TD4149E:254a-13: de gsum gyis bsdus pa'i phyir bcu gnyis ni chos rnams so //
T08TD4149E:254a-14: gsum las gsum dang gnyis las gnyis 'byung la //
T08TD4149E:254a-15: bdun las bdun yin pa'i phyir /
T08TD4149E:254a-16: de kho na 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rgyu dang 'bras bu yang ste /
T08TD4149E:254a-18: 'dir sems can gzhan ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin te /
T08TD4149E:254a-19: stong pa 'od zer ltar chos rnams las stong pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4149E:254a-21: mar me lta bu dag ni rgyu las byung ba'i don du'o //
T08TD4149E:254a-22: rgyu dang de rnams kyi yang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis bka' stsal te zhes pa ni /
T08TD4149E:254a-23: de ji ltar thugs su chud pa de bzhin du gsungs pa'i phyir te /
T08TD4149E:254a-24: gzhan ma yin par gsung ba nyid kyi phyir 'khor ba'i rgyu dang rkyen gsungs pa yin no //
T08TD4149E:254a-25: de la 'gog pa gang yin pa'ang //
T08TD4149E:254a-27: 'ang gi sgra las de kho na rgyu dang bsams par gsungs pa yin gyi /
T08TD4149E:254a-28: sangs rgyas rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa yan lag bcu gnyis 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid kyang gsungs pa yin te /
T08TD4149E:254a-29: zung 'jug pa'i bde ba brtags pa nam mkha'i me tog ma yin zhing sems med pa bems po ma yin pa'i rang bzhin no //
T08TD4149E:254a-30: de skad gsungs pa'i tshul can dge sbyong che //
T08TD4149E:254a-31: zhes bya ba ni zung du 'jug pa gsung ba'i tshul can yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te /
T08TD4149E:254a-32: phyin ci ma log par gsung ba'i tshul can gyi tshangs pa'i cho ga'o //
T08TD4149E:254a-33: 'di ni slob dpon rtag pa'i rdo rjes gsungs pa gzhon nus bsgyur ba'o /
